title: Model-Based Learning

definitions.Model-Based Idea: Learn an approximate model based on experiences
definitions.Solve for values: Solve for values as if the learned model were correct

summary: The slide discusses the concept of Model-Based Learning, which involves learning an approximate model based on experiences and solving for values as if the model were correct. It outlines two steps: learning an empirical MDP model by counting outcomes and normalizing them, and solving the learned MDP, possibly using value iteration.
